|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''AP-114'' (external antenna model) "AJX00C-1.6" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos.
"AQD00N0C-1.6" appears to be silkscreened on the RP-SMA connector boards. :"PCB P/N: 21101938 REV: 01" and "(C) 2013 ARUBA NETWORKS" looks :to be on the bottom of the board. It may be using QCA9558 and AR9380/AR9580 something else. :It would seem probable this device is ''[[QCA]]'' based. Per the FCC test report.. *The EUT is using ''ArubaOS'' (''AOS'') 6.3.0.0 *The stated dimensions are [[Dimensions::170 mm x 170 mm x 45 mm]] *The stated weight is [[Weight::1 kg]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
